articles.description: The Welsh Potting Machine was beaten in the English Open quarter-final by Neil Robertson and had a blunt response to the Australian's congratulations after hitting an historic 147
articles.content:
Mark Williams had fans in stitches and applauding his openness after he issued a blunt response to the praise of rival Neil Robertson. 
Despite posting two centuries, including an historic 147, Will… [+2169 chars]
